posts.postText:
I saw on one server that there is a teleporter.
Primary set a point to teleport to. Secondary teleports you.
The teleport was slow to charge, was really loud and has a limited number of uses.
I actually was killed while teleporting away. :(
It has its uses though.
I thought we had one of those?
If there is one I fail. I instantly buy knife, flare gun, radar and body armor. Nothing else. Ill go look now.
